item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1662; 10:11PM; 5414 S Denker Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/31NJNrt; Harvard Park; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes. Their quick actions prevented the fire from extending into the attic. The primary search was clear with no occupants found. Cause and $ loss TBD. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E46 RA66 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1662; 09:59PM; 5414 S Denker Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/31NJNrt; Harvard Park; One story row of bungalows. Firefighters are making an offensive attack against fire in one room of one unit. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E46 RA66 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Auto vs Ped; INC#1548; 08:37PM; 8539 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dzrc53; Vermont Knolls; Two patients were trapped under a vehicle following the collision and were transported in critical condition (age/gender unknown). All questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 3844. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E221 E264 E33 E57 E64 EM13 HR3 RA264 RA33 RA57 T21 T64; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Red Line vs Pedestrian; INC#1370; 07:29PM; 6250r W Hollywood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rNHRKl; Hollywood; A pedestrian reportedly jumped onto the train from the platform and went through the window into the cab of the train. There are two patients being transported: 1 in critical condition and one with minor, non-life threatening injuries (was on the train). Age/gender unknown at this time. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 4100 and LA County Sheriff's. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 6:53PM. No further details.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC13 BC18 E229 E235 E261 E35 E41 E61 E76 EM11 HR3 RA41 RA76 SQ21 T29 T35 T61; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Confined Space - FATALITY; INC#1085; 04:48PM; 5917 W Burchard Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pI1TmH; Mid-City; Patient (age / gender unknown at this time) was located in an overpass void space and determined dead on scene. LA County Coroner and LAPD (Inc #3318) will handle identification and cause of death determination. LAFD Urban Search and Rescue Task Force may be required to assist in removing body - TBD by Coroner. Original 9-1-1 call received at 3:51PM. No further details.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC5 E227 E5 E68 HR3 T27 UR27 UR88; CH4; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1589; 01:31PM; 8142 N Sunland Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y3f2uu; Sun Valley; In mostly defensive operations, for over two hours, 87 firefighters battled flames with at least four ladder pipes and several other heavy streams in operation on the commercial building with one-story and two-story portions. The bulk of the fire is knocked down, however it will be an extended operation to access the remaining pockets of fire within the debris. LAFD Heavy Equipment has been called to the incident to assist. Other crews are being released to reduce the number of personnel committed. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM42 E227 E239 E24 E260 E273 E274 E288 E289 E298 E35 E75 E77 E88 E89 E90 EA1 EM14 HE1 HR3 RA77 RA89 RA98 T27 T39 T60 T73 T74 T88 T89 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#1589; 11:50PM; 8142 N Sunland Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y3f2uu; Sun Valley; Due to the dilapidated condition of the previously burned structure, crews are withdrawing from the interior and defensive firefighting tactics will be used. Crews outside are setting up heavy streams, including ladder pipes, to continue fighting this fire.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM42 E227 E24 E260 E274 E288 E289 E298 E75 E77 E88 E89 EM14 HR3 RA77 T27 T60 T74 T88 T89 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1589; 11:30PM; 8142 N Sunland Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y3f2uu; Sun Valley; Vacant one-story commercial with heavy fire showing (site of previous burn). Offensive mode.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 E24 E260 E289 E298 E77 E89 T60 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Shooting; INC#1236; 04:46PM; 800 block of N Eubank Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DwASYy; Wilmington; Reported shooting with two patients (11-year-old male critical condition and 25-year-old female moderate condition) transported by LAFD firefighter-paramedics to a local trauma center. Unknown if this is connected to LAFD Inc # 1235. LAPD Inc # 3224. Nothing further.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E285 E38 E49 RA101 RA38 RA79 T85; CH4; 13; Nicholas Prange

Shooting; INC#1235; 04:46PM; 1400 block of E Denni St; MAP: https://bit.ly/31qWwAB; Wilmington; Reported shooting with one patient (9-year-old female) transported by LAFD firefighter-paramedics to a local trauma center in moderate condition. Unknown if this is connected to LAFD Inc # 1236. LAPD Inc # 3240. Nothing further.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E49 RA112 T38; CH4; 12; Nicholas Prange
